snippet.title: New Character collectable RPG ✨STELLA FANTASY✨
snippet.description:
What is Stella Fantasy 

Stella Fantasy is a high quality Web3 game where you can:

👱‍♀️OWN virtual anime waifus
🌃 Manage your own Frontier Town 
⚔️ BATTLE against various bosses for rewards 
🤝 Trade kawaii characters and epic weapons

Let’s look into each gameplay element. 

👱‍♀️OWN virtual anime waifus

You will be able to meet 15 different high-quality characters created with Unreal Engine 4. A lot of effort went into shaders for natural movement. You will be able to meet beautiful anime waifus who live in the world of Stella Fantasy.

🏰 Manage your own Frontier Town 

 You can gather materials and resources from various town production facilities. The number of assigned characters, their stats, and their passive skills will have in-game benefits such as affecting the total productivity of the facilities. 

⚔️ BATTLE against various bosses for rewards

In Team Tag Battle, you can use multiple parties in order to defeat a powerful boss on a seasonal basis. SFTYs will be rewarded according to their final standings on the ranking board at the end of each season.

🤝Trade kawaii characters and epic weapons

All kawaii characters and epic weapons can be sold on the Marketplace or used for battle to challenge more difficult content in which you can yield better rewards. Choose your own waifus, and strengthen them for battle!

Join our Community to learn more 👇
Website: https://stellafantasy.io
Discord: https://discord.gg/stellafantasy
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rstellafantasy
Medium: https://medium.com/@stella_fantasy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/stella__fantasy/
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@stellafantasy_

#web3 #games #gameplay #web3games #bcg #rpg #anime
